page.title: 07EDUCATION
page.content: {Primary. Millbrook C.E.(Aided) School.Ages 5-11,205 children,6 full-time staff including headmaster,2 part-time. Forelanesend Primary.Ages 5-11,70 children, 3 full-time staff including headmaster,1 part-time. {Torpoint Comprehensive School.} At secondary age children travel by special bus.3 double decker buses from Millbrook.No transport from St.John. {Sixth form.} 16+ children go to Saltash Comprehensive or Plymouth College of further education. {Private.} Small percentage of local children go to private school.Fee paying schools in Plymouth.Plymouth College (boys) St.Dunstan's (girls). Some go to boarding schools, mainly from Naval famlies.
